title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 22 March 2017 - XWiki

10:44 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
11:00 <Pbas> Hello, It seem I crash l10n.xwiki.org with my translation key searc :-/  
11:01 <Pbas> search  
11:01 <tmortagne> Pbas: every time you search it crashes ?  
11:01 <Pbas> It is very long but no  
11:01 <tmortagne> I indeed just received a crash mail but it's not very clear what is the root cause  
11:02 <Pbas> Probably because I didn't used " character to search my string  
11:02 <tmortagne> you don't need "  
11:03 <Pbas> ok then I will search again without " to chceck if I crashed again http://l10n.xwiki.org  
11:04 <Pbas> anyway maybe it is not my fault ...  
11:04 <tmortagne> I did a search this mornind and it worked fine  
11:04 <tmortagne> I did a search this morning and it worked fine  
11:04 <tmortagne> (a bit slow but I got an answer)  
11:05 <Pbas> Here the url, I used to have an Internal Server Error  
11:05 <Pbas> http://l10n.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/L10N/Search?application=Platform&transtext=Extra+accessibility+will+enable+various+visual+enhancements+like%3A+bigger+fonts%2C+underlined+links%2C+etc.&x=0&y=0  
11:07 <Pbas> It is up :)  
11:07 <Pbas> ty  
11:11 <floflobel> has joined #xwiki  
11:19 <anamika> has joined #xwiki  
11:25 <acotiuga> has joined #xwiki  
11:28 <anamika> Hi, I am Anamika, Is this project "Improve l10n.xwiki.org" for GSoC 2017? Can I still contribute to it?  
11:30 <tmortagne> Hi Anamika  
11:31 <tmortagne> the GSOC proposal period is not finished yet so you can certainly read http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/GoogleSummerOfCode/Guidelines, try l10n.xwiki.org and propose improvements  
11:32 <tmortagne> note that org.xwiki.extension.xar.job.diff.DocumentUnifiedDiff and DiffXarJobStatus are not internal so the transition is going to be a bit of a pain  
11:41 <tmortagne> that's weird, gmail seems to see most github notification as SPAM for me now  
11:41 <tmortagne> that's weird, gmail seems to see most github notifications as SPAM for me now  
11:42 <tmortagne> since 2 days only  
11:42 <tmortagne> ha no a bit more actually
